summary: This document discusses an alert regarding Richard D. Kahn, who was initially flagged due to a false positive related to a different individual with a similar name. After review, it was determined that Richard D. Kahn is not the same person as the one associated with the alert, and he has been working at HBRK Associates Inc. for three years. The document includes communications between compliance team members at Deutsche Bank regarding the alert and Kahn's status.

keyFacts: The alert for Richard D. Kahn was determined to be a false positive after further review.
Richard D. Kahn has been working at HBRK Associates Inc. for the past three years.
The alert involved a different Richard Kahn who was associated with PennMont Securities, which was banned from NYSE Arca.
Michael Vila confirmed the clearance of the alert based on reasonable evidence provided by Richard D. Kahn.
Amanda Kirby indicated that Richard D. Kahn would not be a client of the bank but was a trustee for a trust account.
